backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing registrants, user profiles, and access control with CRUD operations and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three game-related feature requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of key frontend files including pages, components, hooks, utilities, and configuration.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing steps, verification, troubleshooting, and canister ID recording for mainnet deployment.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining warm color tokens and light/dark theme variables for the UI.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application wiring router routes, global layout, theme provider, query client, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main application layout with navigation, authentication controls, user badge display, and deployment info banner.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Provides sign‑in and sign‑out button logic using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentInfo.t: Displays deployment diagnostics in a popover, including canister mismatch details and copyable config fields.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save a display name.
frontend/src/components/world/PlanetWorl: Renders a rotating 3D planet with animated star‑shaped inhabitants positioned using world placement utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches and exposes current user profile, admin status, and authentication state using the actor and identity hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook managing login, logout, identity persistence, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for registrant and profile CRUD operations using an ICP actor, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserBadge.ts: Fetches or creates a user badge via the actor with caching, identity checks, and limited retries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using a warm amber palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Directory UI allowing users to search, filter, and for admins delete registrants with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Static events page presenting completed and upcoming steps with informational cards.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Interactive brick-removal mini‑game tracking progress and showing a reveal after the first brick is removed.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page presenting the Web3 network, hero content, features, and navigation buttons based on auth state.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfilesPage.ts: Displays public registrants with sector filtering, grouped views, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Registration form for users to create or update their profile with validation, interests, social links, and visibility settings.
frontend/src/pages/WorldPage.tsx: Shows a digital world visualization of registrant count with auth gating, stats, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentInfo.ts: Utility for inferring deployment network and canister IDs from environment variables and hostname with mismatch diagnostics.
frontend/src/utils/oisyWallet.ts: Empty placeholder file for Oisy wallet utilities.
frontend/src/utils/sector.ts: Defines sector options and provides a helper to get human-readable sector labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/src/utils/worldPlacement.ts: Generates deterministic 3D positions and colors for inhabitants using golden‑ratio based distribution and seeded randomness.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, including feature plans, architectural notes, known issues, and version metadata.
